query:
UPDATE campaign_requests SET (id, 
account_id, 
link, 
unit_amount, 
price_per_point, 
min_individual_reward, 
max_individual_reward, 
thumbs_up_only, 
status, 
stripe_session_url, 
stripe_session_id, 
campaign_id, 
created_at) = ((CASE $2::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $3 ELSE id END), (CASE $4::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $5 ELSE account_id END), (CASE $6::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $7 ELSE link END), (CASE $8::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $9 ELSE unit_amount END), (CASE $10::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $11 ELSE price_per_point END), (CASE $12::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $13 ELSE min_individual_reward END), (CASE $14::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $15 ELSE max_individual_reward END), (CASE $16::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $17 ELSE thumbs_up_only END), (CASE $18::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $19 ELSE status END), (CASE $20::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $21 ELSE stripe_session_url END), (CASE $22::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $23 ELSE stripe_session_id END), (CASE $24::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $25 ELSE campaign_id END), (CASE $26::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $27 ELSE created_at END)) WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id as "id!: i32", 
account_id as "account_id!: String", 
link as "link!: String", 
unit_amount as "unit_amount!: i32", 
price_per_point as "price_per_point!: String", 
min_individual_reward as "min_individual_reward!: String", 
max_individual_reward as "max_individual_reward!: String", 
thumbs_up_only as "thumbs_up_only!: bool", 
status as "status!: CampaignRequestStatus", 
stripe_session_url as "stripe_session_url!: Option < String >", 
stripe_session_id as "stripe_session_id!: Option < String >", 
campaign_id as "campaign_id!: Option < i32 >", 
created_at as "created_at!: DateTime < Utc >"
